message.content:
1. A randomized controlled comparison was conducted between spinal MR imaging with an open scanner and a short-bore scanner.
2. The short-bore MR imaging revealed higher image quality.
3. The short-bore MR imaging had shorter scanning times.
4. The comparison involved spinal MR imaging.

messages.content:
Statement: In this randomized controlled comparison of spinal MR imaging with an open versus a short-bore scanner, short-bore MR imaging revealed considerably higher image quality with shorter scanning times.

List all the facts we explicitly know from the statement. Make each fact as atomic as possible.
